articles.title: Laid‑off Washington Post staff rally outside DC headquarters after massive cuts - WTOP
articles.description: Former employees rallied outside The Washington Post after the paper laid off about one-third of its newsroom, calling the cuts devastating for local news and democracy.

articles.title: January Layoffs Surge Across US, Jobs Report Says - Forbes
articles.description: There were 108,000 job cuts in January in the U.S., the most to begin a year since the Great Recession in 2009, according to a new report.
